amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce appropriations in the bill for the Department of Defense to fiscal year 2008 levels.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 141 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds for any account of the Department of Defense (other than accounts listed in subsection (b)) in excess of the amount made available for such account for fiscal year 2008.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendment (A140) Failed by recorded vote: 76 - 344 (Roll no. 128).
